name: Aresbot
description:
The story takes place three years from the time of first release of this game. You are a robot operator/programmer for NASA or SpaceX or some other space agency (not the Chinese one, or who cares, I don't know, hell it might even be the Iranian space agency - I don't care). You land on Mars and must explore it.

The story has some good twists and turns. I hope you will enjoy it.

Interaction

Comments and ratings have been turned off because I have jittery nerves and don't want to be on the receiving end of vitriolic and toxic backlash. You know, the reason I got put on the evil entities list is that I am a neurodivergent weirdo, and so I've been banned from multiple Google and Meta services as a result of my personality flaws. Most people were born to obey. I was born to explore. Explorers tend to be the square pegs that don't fit in society's round holes, as Steve Jobs used to say, back when he was alive.

Anyways.
